dialogueTree.title: File Cabinet: "The file cabinet stands steady as e..."
dialogueTree.text: The file cabinet stands steady as ever. Sliding out a drawer presents you the folders you already went through. On top of them is the handwritten note.

links.title: You: "Browse through the folders."
links.text: Browse through the folders.

links.title: File Cabinet: "Hundreds of documents containing lo..."
links.text: Hundreds of documents containing logistical data. Two kinds of transactions stand out: materials coming into Revachol from the outside world -- from Mundi, Graad, and even Iilmaraa...

links.title: File Cabinet: "...and the same materials being han..."
links.text: ...and the same materials being handed over to companies inside Revachol. Couron, Coal City, La Delta, and Jamrock are listed among the many districts where the imports are being sold.

links.title: You: "Anything interesting? (Browse them...."
links.text: Anything interesting? (Browse them.)

links.title: File Cabinet: "You already went through all of the..."
links.text: You already went through all of these.

links.title: File Cabinet: "It's hard to make sense of this thi..."
links.text: It's hard to make sense of this thicket of company names, dates, quantities, and percentages. You try to focus, but the lines are getting blurry...

links.title: You: "Read the note."
links.text: Read the note.

links.title: File Cabinet: "REMEMBER, LEO! * EVRART'S SHOES..."
links.text:
REMEMBER, LEO!

* EVRART'S SHOES
* SPECIAL WHIRLING BORSCHT
* WATER EVRART'S PLANTS
* SWEEP OFFICE FLOOR
* MORE BANNERS

links.title: File Cabinet: "All items on the list have been cro..."
links.text: All items on the list have been crossed out and the note itself is crumpled.

links.title: You: "Force yourself to go through the fo..."
links.text: Force yourself to go through the folders.

links.title: Volition: "Whatever's hidden here is hidden we..."
links.text: Whatever's hidden here is hidden well. Concentration isn't enough, only a trained accountant, with a background in logistics, would be able to *really* make sense of it. However there *is* a little hand-written note, stuck on the side of the drawer.

links.title: You: "Look at the note."
links.text: Look at the note.

links.title: File Cabinet: "It appears to be a to-do list writt..."
links.text: It appears to be a to-do list written in large, uneven capital letters:

links.title: File Cabinet: "REMEMBER, LEO! * EVRART'S SHOES..."
links.text:
REMEMBER, LEO!

* EVRART'S SHOES
* SPECIAL WHIRLING BORSCHT
* WATER EVRART'S PLANTS
* SWEEP OFFICE FLOOR
* MORE BANNERS

links.title: File Cabinet: "All items on the list have been cro..."
links.text: All items on the list have been crossed out and the note itself is crumpled.

links.title: You: "(Turn to the lieutenant.) "Look, Ki..."
links.text: (Turn to the lieutenant.) "Look, Kim, a to-do note with a list of errands for *Evrart*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Evrart Claire, probably -- the hea..."
links.text: "Evrart Claire, probably -- the head of the Débardeurs' Union." He inspects the note. "One of his aides must have left it. Nothing incriminating here."

links.title: Logic: "The *special* borscht seems a bit o..."
links.text: The *special* borscht seems a bit odd in the list.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "What is so special about this *bors..."
links.text: What is so special about this *borscht*? Code for drugs? Booze? Blood?

links.title: You: "Ignore the note."
links.text: Ignore the note.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The leader of the Débardeurs' Unio..."
links.text: "The leader of the Débardeurs' Union, Evrart Claire, has someone running errands for him." He points to the list. "Nothing incriminating here, though."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Doesn't look too incriminating -- b..."
links.text: Doesn't look too incriminating -- but still feels like a *find*.

links.title: You: ""Never mind the note." (Close the d..."
links.text: "Never mind the note." (Close the drawer.)

links.title: File Cabinet: "The drawer slides shut smoothly."
links.text: The drawer slides shut smoothly.

links.title: Volition: "You're trying hard, but the data he..."
links.text: You're trying hard, but the data here is *unbelievably* dry. Something about containers...

links.title: Volition: "Look how blurry all the lines on th..."
links.text: Look how blurry all the lines on these papers are -- how unwieldy your own willpower is to yourself. You're like an absurdist Samaran monk -- focusing through not focusing.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Hermeneutics was almost within your..."
links.text: Hermeneutics was almost within your grasp, but now only vague letters float before your eyes. Less meaningful, but aesthetically more pleasing.

links.title: You: ""If I let my eyes go completely out..."
links.text: "If I let my eyes go completely out of focus, all shapes start melting into each other."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Is that what you're doing with tho..."
links.text: "Is that what you're doing with those folders over there?"

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right." The lieutenant's expressio..."
links.text: "Right." The lieutenant's expression stiffens. "This is probably not relevant to our case. After all, we are not investigating an accounting mystery."

links.title: You: ""No, of course not.""
links.text: "No, of course not."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." He turns away from the file..."
links.text: "Good." He turns away from the file cabinet. "This is probably not relevant to our case anyway. After all, we are not investigating an accounting mystery."

links.title: You: ""Let's just get back to work, lieut..."
links.text: "Let's just get back to work, lieutenant."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My thought exactly, officer." He t..."
links.text: "My thought exactly, officer." He turns away from the file cabinet. "Shall we?"

links.title: You: "Could I actually focus through *not..."
links.text: Could I actually focus through *not* focusing?

links.title: Volition: "You are a police officer, not a spi..."
links.text: You are a police officer, not a spiritual healer. You can focus the normal way by turning your attention to something and not letting go.

links.title: You: "Leave the folders alone for now."
links.text: Leave the folders alone for now.

links.title: You: "Close the drawer. [Leave.]"
links.text: Close the drawer. [Leave.]

links.title: File Cabinet: "The drawer slides shut smoothly."
links.text: The drawer slides shut smoothly.

dialogueTree.title: File Cabinet: "The file cabinet stands steady as e..."
dialogueTree.text: The file cabinet stands steady as ever and the unlocked drawer slides out to greet you.

dialogueTree.title: File Cabinet: "There it still is -- inviting you t..."
dialogueTree.text: There it still is -- inviting you to...

links.title: You: "Open the drawer."
links.text: Open the drawer.

links.title: File Cabinet: "The drawer opens smoothly. Inside i..."
links.text: The drawer opens smoothly. Inside is a well-organized selection of brown folders.

links.title: Interfacing: "It's probably on rails."
links.text: It's probably on rails.

links.title: You: "Ignore drawer for now. [Leave.]"
links.text: Ignore drawer for now. [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: File Cabinet: "On second glance, someone has forgo..."
dialogueTree.text: On second glance, someone has forgotten to properly close one of the drawers.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's *unfortunate* for the Union t..."
links.text: "It's *unfortunate* for the Union to just leave their paperwork lying around like this..."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "...let's see what's inside, he thin..."
links.text: ...let's see what's inside, he thinks.
